Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm

This package contains the data model abstractions appearing in the various protocol roles such as credentials, attributes, or commitments.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Attribute Attributes consists of a link to an attribute structure, a value, and possibly a list of prime factors.
Commitment Class to express a Commitment to one or more messages.
CommitmentOpening This class is a sub-class of Commitment.
Credential Credential abstraction.
DomNym Domain nym abstraction.
MasterSecret The user's master secret.
MessageToSign Abstraction for messages to be signed in Fiat-Shamir hash.
Nym Pseudonym abstraction.
Representation Class to express a Representation of the form R := g_1^x_1 * ...
RepresentationOpening This class is a sub-class of Represenation.
Value Object that contains the value of an attribute during the issuance process.
Values Object that contains a list of values.
 

Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm Description

This package contains the data model abstractions appearing in the various protocol roles such as credentials, attributes, or commitments.

See Also:
@see com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof
